freenet.node.updater
Class RevocationChecker

java.lang.Object
  freenet.node.updater.RevocationChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientBaseCallback, ClientGetCallback, RequestClient
public class RevocationChecker
extends Object
implements ClientGetCallback, RequestClient

Fetches the revocation key. Each time it starts, it will try to fetch it until it has 3 DNFs. If it ever finds it, it will be immediately fed to the NodeUpdateManager.

start

public boolean start(boolean aggressive,
                     boolean reset)
Start a fetch.

Parameters:
aggressive - If set to true, then we have just fetched an update, and therefore can increase the priority of the fetch to maximum.
Returns:
True if the checker was already running and the counter was not reset.
